name: Singles: Flirt Up Your Life!
description:
Singles: Flirt Up Your Life! is a strategy game developed by Rotobee. It came out on 09-04-2004. Deep Silver published the game. Singles: Flirt Up Your Life! has a Metascore of 58, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Singles: Flirt Up Your Life! on PC.
